thread.section_title: Cruisesalefinder Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Cruisesalefinder | cruisesalefinder.com.au
thread.title: Mary Harris

author: Mary Harris
title: Mary Harris
text: At this stage, I haven't been on the Cruise. Still have to complete the 'on-line' Check In points. Point 4 stumps me each time I try to fill it in. It asks me to check with 'Cruisesalefinder', but there isn't any way that I can click on to this part of the check-in points, thus making it difficult to continue onto the 'E-Tickets' Section (Point 5).
